mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu (Code, Name, ParentId, Level, PageUrl, Remark, Enable, IsVisiable, MenuIcon, OrderNum, IsShortcut, BtnStyle) VALUES (#{Code}, #{Name}, #{ParentId}, #{Level}, #{PageUrl}, #{Remark}, #{Enable}, #{IsVisiable}, #{MenuIcon}, #{OrderNum}, #{IsShortcut} , #{BtnStyle})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_menu WHERE Id = #{Id} OR ParentId = ${Id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_menu ORDER BY OrderNum
SELECT concat('[',a.Code,'] ',a.Name) as name,a.Id as id,'' as url,true as open,a.ParentId,a.*,a.Name as MenuName FROM sys_menu a WHERE a.ParentId IS NULL OR a.ParentId = 0 ORDER BY a.OrderNum
SELECT * FROM sys_menu a WHERE a.Id = #{Id}
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE ParentId IS NULL OR ParentId = 0

SELECT DISTINCT t.Id,t.Name,t.Code,t.ParentId,t.Level,t.Enable,t.IsVisiable,t.MenuIcon,t.PageUrl,t.IsShortcut,t.BtnStyle FROM sys_menu t INNER JOIN ( SELECT b.MenuId FROM sys_userrole a INNER JOIN sys_rolemenu b ON a.RoleId = b.RoleId WHERE a.userId = #{userId} UNION SELECT b.MenuId FROM sys_userorganization a INNER JOIN sys_orgmenu b ON a.OrgId = b.OrganizationId WHERE a.userId = #{userId} UNION SELECT b.MenuId FROM sys_usergroup a INNER JOIN sys_groupmenu b ON a.GroupId = b.GroupId WHERE a.userId = #{userId} UNION SELECT b.MenuId FROM sys_user a INNER JOIN sys_usermenu b ON a.Id = b.UserId WHERE a.Id = #{userId} ) v ON t.Id = v.MenuId WHERE t.Enable = 1 ORDER BY t.OrderNum

SELECT * FROM sys_permision x WHERE x.IsEnable = 1 AND x.Id IN ( SELECT b.PermisionId FROM sys_userrole a INNER JOIN sys_rolemenu b ON a.RoleId = b.RoleId WHERE a.userId = #{userId} AND b.MenuId = #{menuId} UNION SELECT b.PermisionId FROM sys_userorganization a INNER JOIN sys_orgmenu b ON a.OrgId = b.OrganizationId WHERE a.userId = #{userId} AND b.MenuId = #{menuId} UNION SELECT b.PermisionId FROM sys_usergroup a INNER JOIN sys_groupmenu b ON a.GroupId = b.GroupId WHERE a.userId = #{userId} AND b.MenuId = #{menuId} UNION SELECT b.PermisionId FROM sys_user a INNER JOIN sys_usermenu b ON a.Id = b.UserId WHERE a.Id = #{userId} AND b.MenuId = #{menuId} )

SELECT * FROM sys_permision_component x WHERE x.IsEnable = 1 AND x.Id IN ( SELECT b.ComponentPermisionId FROM sys_userrole a INNER JOIN sys_rolemenu_component b ON a.RoleId = b.RoleId WHERE a.userId = #{userId} AND b.MenuId = #{menuId} UNION SELECT b.ComponentPermisionId FROM sys_userorganization a INNER JOIN sys_orgmenu_component b ON a.OrgId = b.OrganizationId WHERE a.userId = #{userId} AND b.MenuId = #{menuId} UNION SELECT b.ComponentPermisionId FROM sys_usergroup a INNER JOIN sys_groupmenu_component b ON a.GroupId = b.GroupId WHERE a.userId = #{userId} AND b.MenuId = #{menuId} UNION SELECT b.ComponentPermisionId FROM sys_user a INNER JOIN sys_usermenu_component b ON a.Id = b.UserId WHERE a.Id = #{userId} AND b.MenuId = #{menuId} )
